about_the_game:
*The full version of the game (sold separately) is required to use this content. If necessary, please install the latest software patch(es).

●Description
Healing Staff & Armor Gem Assortment
This set includes a healing wand to help new players in the early stages of the game, as well as armor gems to use in a pinch or when the time comes to upgrade your armor. The right equipment will make your journey much easier!

The following items are included:
-Unnamed Gem x4
-Shield Gem x3
-Hat Gem x3
-Helmet Gem x3
-Light Armor Gem x3
-Heavy Armor Gem ×3
-Inner Gem ×3
-Accessory Gem ×3
-Healing Staff (Weapon) x 1

*DLC items can be obtained by entering your room on the second floor of the Dragon Inn after downloading the game.
detailed_description:
About This Additional Content

This content is part of the early bird purchase bonus.
Early Bird Purchase Bonus Period: from April 26, 2022 8:00 (PDT) until May 9, 2022 23:59 (PDT).


About the Game

*The full version of the game (sold separately) is required to use this content. If necessary, please install the latest software patch(es).

●Description
Healing Staff & Armor Gem Assortment
This set includes a healing wand to help new players in the early stages of the game, as well as armor gems to use in a pinch or when the time comes to upgrade your armor. The right equipment will make your journey much easier!

The following items are included:

-Light Armor Gem x3
-Heavy Armor Gem ×3

*DLC items can be obtained by entering your room on the second floor of the Dragon Inn after downloading the game.

name: DEMON GAZE EXTRA - Healing Staff & Armor Gem Assortment

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-2510E 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7300U 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

short_description: This set includes a healing wand to help new players in the early stages of the game, as well as armor gems to use in a pinch or when the time comes to upgrade your armor.
supported_languages:
English*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
